column23: so oblate and spinning so rapidly that its gravity varies from 3g at its equator to 700g at its poles! Charles Lackland and his team of human space faring scientists can manage at the equator with mechanically assisted survival suits but existence under 700g at the poles is simply beyond human engineering capabilities.
